title: Topic 001 Question 329
body: A company’s security engineer needs to restrict access to AWS so that the company can deploy resources only in the eu-west-1 Region. The company uses AWS Organizations and has applied the following SCP at the organization’s root level:
/Amazon AWS Certified Security - Specialty Exam Practice Questions/img/image1.png
The company uses Amazon S3, Amazon Route 53, Amazon CloudFront, and AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM). These services must still work in eu-west-1.
Which entry should the security engineer remove from the NotAction element in the Deny policy to achieve this goal?
